RadioactiveGeodes.config.chance.name: Chance
RadioactiveGeodes.config.chance.descript: Chance of replacing Iridium Ore with Radioactive Ore. Higher numbers lower the chance.
RadioactiveGeodes.config.debug.name: Debug mode
RadioactiveGeodes.config.debug.descripti: Enables logging of extra information to help decipher issues.
RadioactiveGeodes.config.requirebothshri: Require both hard mode shrines to be active at the same time in order for geodes to produce radioactive ore.
RadioactiveGeodes.debug.postfix: Postfix Activated with: {{Name}} of stack size {{Stack}}
RadioactiveGeodes.debug.postfix.requireb: Not enough Hard Mode Shrines activated.
